net.sf.JRecord.IO

Class LineIOProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.IO.LineIOProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractManager

    public class LineIOProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements AbstractManager
    LineIOprovider - This class returns a LineIO class appropriate for the supplied file structure. All the Files Structures are available as Constants.IO_*. Note: This is part of the "old JRecord Interface". Most users will be better off using net.sf.JRecord.net.sf.JRecord.JRecordInterface1 to create IIOBuilder classes. 
     Usage:

         CopybookLoader loader = new RecordEditorXmlLoader();
         ExternalRecord extlayout = loader.loadCopyBook(copybookName, 0, 0, "", 0, 0, null);

         LayoutDetail layout = extlayout.asLayoutDetail();
         AbstractLineWriter writer = LineIOProvider.getInstance().getLineWriter(layout.getFileStructure());
    Version:
    0.55
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
